thanks dude, feel free to post the info in the comments for the next few rips i do, i just dont want it filling up the description :)

Thanks!,

i'm that guy who ask you few days ago on facebook how to burn your vinyl torrents to a cd;)
i'll seed this torrent for 200 or 300%

The ripper hasn't yet discovered the crop filter :-(  Huge black bars left and right and a thin one top and bottom too.  The bluray disc contains DTS but all the rippers, including this one, have ignored this and offered only the AC3.  It's nice to have but with the picture uncropped and encoded at crf 22 and the same audio as the DVD there's no advantage over the DVD (A grainy film like this is where crf method falls down and you can get some major quality benefit by using 2 pass).  It could have been and should have been so much better.

Uncompressed png screenshot: 

http://img841.imageshack.us/img841/2916/shot0002rx.png
